import moment from "moment/moment"; import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import ProfileTabs from "../components/profileComponents/ProfileTabs"; import { getUserDetails, login } from "../Redux/Action/UserAction"; import Orders from "./../components/profileComponents/Orders"; const ProfileScreen = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const userDetails = useSelector((state) => state.userDetails); const { userInfo } = userDetails; const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getUserDetails()); }, []); return ( <>
{userInfo.name}
<>birthDay: {moment(userInfo.birthDay).format(`LL`)}
{/* panels */}
); }; export default ProfileScreen;
